definitions.definition: A disease characterised by inflammation of the intestines , especially the colon ( large intestine ), accompanied by pus ( white blood cells ) in the feces , fever , pain in the abdomen , high- volume diarrhea , and possible blood in the feces .

main_definition: ( pathology ) A disease characterised by inflammation of the intestines , especially the colon ( large intestine ), accompanied by pus ( white blood cells ) in the feces , fever , pain in the abdomen , high- volume diarrhea , and possible blood in the feces .
